name: Fight Night (itch)
description:
The sun is down and the neon is out. Too much light and you can't see a thing. Too little light and you can't see a thing. It's just as easy to hide in the glow as it is to hide in the rain and the dark.

Both you and the enemies are camouflaged by this block. How many of them can you defeat?

++ CONTROLS ++

Move = WASD or Arrow Keys

Aim = Mouse

Attack = Left Mouse

Bullet Time = Shift

Restart = R

Made for the 2021 Amaze Me Game Jam.

WARNING: Contains flashing lights. Lots of them.
